Connie Temweka Gabisile Chiume (amụrụ n'abalị ise nke ọnwa Jun, 1952), bụ onye ome ihe nkiri nke South Africa ma bụrụ agbụrụ Malawi
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na fiim Black Panther, Black Is King na Blessers yana na telivishọn maka Zone 14 na Rhythm City
Connie na-emekwa ihe na soapie nke South Africa na Mzansi Magic a na-akpọ Gomora
A mụrụ ya n'abalị ise nke ọnwa Jun n'afọ 1952 na Welkom, South Africa
Nna ya bụ, Wright Tadeyo Chiume, sitere na Usisya, Nkhata Bay, Malawi ma nne ya bụ, MaNdlovu, sitere na KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa
Nna ya nwụrụ na 1983 na Malawi
Ọ nọrọ oge  nwata ya na Welkom, bụ́ ebe ọ gakwara akwụkwọ
Ọ kwagara Eastern Cape iji mechaa matrick
Otú ọ dị, ọ gụchaghị akwụkwọ ọmụmụ nọọsụ n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ka a zụọ ya dị ka onye nkụzi
Site na mmasị ahụ, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mmụta nkuzi na 1976
Mgbe afọ ole na ole nke ịkụzi  ihe gasịrị, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm wee gaa Izrel
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ kwagara Gris ka ọ malite ọrụ ime ihe nkiri
Nne ya nwụrụ na Machị 2020
Nwa nwanne nna ya, Ephraim Mganda Chiume bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Malawi.
Connie lụrụ di na 1985 wee gbaa alụkwaghịm na 2004
Ọ bụ nne nke ụmụ anọ: ụmụ nwoke abụọ na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Mgbe ọ kwagachara Gris na 1977, ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri  n'ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka Porgy na Bess, Ipi Ntombi, na Little Shop of Horrors
N'afọ 1989, ọ pụtara na usoro onyonyo Inkom'Edla Yodwa ka ọ laghachiri na South Africa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka 'Thembi' na usoro ahụ
Mgbe usoro ihe omume ahụ gasịrị, a kpọrọ ya òkù ka ọ Sonye na film Warrior from Hell na 1990, nke mere ka ọ pụta ìhè na sinima
N'afọ 2000, ọ meriri ihe nrite Connie the Avanti maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na usoro ihe nkiri n'oge mmemme ihe nkiri South Africa na Television Awards (SAFTA)
Na 2005, o gosipụtara agwa dị ka 'Stella Moloi', na usoro ihe nkiri SABC1 Zone 14, ebe ọ ritere ihe nrite Golden Horn
Site na usoro ihe nrite  ahụ ọ ghọrọ onye n'ewu ewu nke ukwuu, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ndu ruo 2010
Ọ nwetakwara ihe nrite maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma na ihe nkiri n'oge SAFTA nke atọ
Na 2015, ọ pụtara na soap opera nke Rhythm City gosipụta agwa ọrụ nne dị ka 'Mamokete Khuse'
Ihe ngosi a ghọrọ nke ama ama nke ukwuu na South Africa
N'afọ 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ isi n'ime ihe nkiri nkwago ndị dị ka You Strike the Woman and you Strike the Rock
N'afọ 2020, ọ gbara n'usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn Gomora na ngosipụta agwa dị ka'Mam'Sonto Molefe'
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ pụtakwara na usoro telivishọn ọzọ bụ Black Is King
N'ime usoro ahụ, ọ n'egosiputa n'ihe nkiri  dị ka nne na-enweghị isi
N’ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, e nyere ya onyinye nhọpụta First Feather
N'afọ 2018, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Hollywood blockbuster Black Panther Onye ama ama South Africa bụ omee John Kani
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka okenye n'ami mmanụ nụ Mining Tribe Elder  n'ihe nkiri ahụ
